content.description: In the underlined portion of sentence 7 (reproduced below), the writer wants to make a claim that logically sets up the information that follows in the sentence.
content.question: It was an unusual experiment: sonification helped the researchers better identify the indicators of black holes.Which of the following versions of the underlined portion of sentence 7 best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: The researchers were from Harvard University

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Develop a line of reasoning and commentary that explains it throughout an argument.
